{"id":1312189940,"question_id":3466,"lang":"cpp","lang_name":"C++","time":"7Â months","timestamp":1720309796,"status":10,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"366 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/1312189940/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Number of Subarrays With AND Value of K","memory":"94 MB","code":"//class Solution {\n//public:\n/*\nGiven an array of integers nums and an integer k, return the number of \nsubarrays of nums where the bitwise AND of the elements of the subarray equals k.\n */\n/*    long long countSubarrays(vector<int>& nums, int k) { //1 <= nums.length <= 105, 0 <= nums[i], k <= 109\n        int sz = nums.size();\n        //the number of subarrays of nums ending with ith element where the bitwise AND of the elements of the subarray equals k\n        \n    }\n};*/\n\nclass Solution {\npublic:\n    \n    int solve(vector <int> &count,int i,int j){\n        int num = 0;\n        for(int k=0;k<32;k++){\n            if((i-j+1)==count[k]) \n                num = num|(1<<k);\n        }\n        return num;\n    }\n    long long findSol(vector <int> &nums,int tar){\n         vector <int> count(32,0);\n        int j = 0;\n        long long ans = 0;\n        for(int i=0;i<nums.size();i++){\n            for(int k=0;k<32;k++){\n                if(nums[i]&(1<<k)) count[k]+=1;\n            }\n            \n            while(j<=i && solve(count,i,j)<tar ){\n                for(int k=0;k<32;k++){\n                if(nums[j]&(1<<k)) count[k]-=1;\n            }\n                j+=1;\n            }\n            ans+=(i-j+1);\n        }\n        return ans;\n    }\n    long long countSubarrays(vector<int>& nums, int tar) {\n       \n        return findSol(nums,tar)-findSol(nums,tar+1);\n\n    }\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"number-of-subarrays-with-and-value-of-k","has_notes":false,"flag_type":1}
